Uses of Class
com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j.Account

  • Packages that use Account 
    Package Description
    com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j  

    • Uses of Account in com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j

      Methods in com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j that return Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account Payment.begin()
      Begin a new payment session.
      Account Wallet.createAccount()
      Creates a new account, insert next deterministic key in Wallet.
      Account Wallet.getAccount()
      Returns the first Account in this Wallet.
      Account HistoryItem.getAccount()
      The Account of this item.
      Account Wallet.getAccount(int index)
      Returns the Account at given index in this Wallet.
      Account Wallet.getAccount(String address)
      Returns the Account with given address if it is part of this Wallet
      Methods in com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j that return types with arguments of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Account> Wallet.getAllAccounts()
      Returns a lists of all accounts inside this Wallet.
      HashMap<Account,Balance> Wallet.getBalances()
      Returns how many NANO is owned and how many have not yet been received by all addresses in Wallet.
      HashMap<Account,Balance> Wallet.getBalances(NANO threshold)
      Returns Accounts in Wallet with balances more or equal to threshold.
      Methods in com.nanoxic.nanorpc4j with parameters of type Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Wallet.contains(Account account)
      Check whether wallet contains account.
      String Account.send(Account destinationAccount, NANO amount, String id)
      Send amount from this Account to destination Account.
      boolean Payment.wait(Account account, NANO amount, long timeout)
      Wait for payment of 'amount' to arrive in 'account' or until 'timeout' milliseconds have elapsed.
